content: rs row travel right to left across the chart the ws row travel left to right across the chart ** diamond chart #1 diamond chart #2 16 16 15 15 14 14 13 13 12 12 11 11 10 10 9 9 8 8 7 7 6 6 5 5 4 4 3 3 2 2 1 1 diamond chart #3 diamond chart #4 16 16 15 15 14 14 13 13 12 12 11 11 10 10 9 9 8 8 7 7 6 6 5 5 4 4 3 3 2 2 1 1 remember that these are just the charts and the special edges need to be put in they are written above and must be put in for each row diamond chart #1 row 1 rs *p1 k6 p1* work 12 times row 2 ws *p1 k1 p4 k1 p1* row 3 *k2 p1 k2 p1 k2* row 4 *p3 k2 p3* row 5 *k3 p2 k3* row 6 *p2 k1 p2 k1 p2* row 7 *k1 p1 k4 p1 k1* row 8 *k1 p6 k1* **repeat these 8 row once more** diamond chart #2 row 1 rs knit all stitches row 2 ws *p3 k1 p4* work 12 times row 3 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k2* row 4 *p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2* row 5 *k1 p1* across row 6 *p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2* row 7 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k2* row 8 *p3 k1 p4* row 9 *k4 p1 k3* row 10 *p2 k1 p1 k1 p3* row 11 *k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1* row 12 *k1 p1* across row 13 *k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1* row 14 *p2 k1 p1 k1 p3* row 15 *k4 p1 k3* row 16 purl all stitches diamond chart #3 row 1 rs *k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1* row 2 ws *p2 k1 p1 k1 p3* row 3 *p1 k3 p1 k3* row 4 *k1 p5 k1 p1* row 5 *p1 k1 p1 k3 p1 k1* row 6 *k1 p5 k1 p1* row 7 *p1 k3 p1 k3* row 8 *p2 k1 p1 k1 p3* **repeat these 8 row once more** diamond chart #4 row 1 rs *k1 p1* across row 2 ws *p1 k1 p3 k1 p1 k1* row 3 *k1 p1 k5 p1* row 4 *p7 k1* row 5 * k1 p1 k5 p1* row 6 *p1 k1 p3 k1 p1 k1* row 7 *k1 p1* across row 8 *p1 k1* across **repeat these 8 row once more**
